audio_description: Today we’re making Mughlai Chicken Biryani. If you like Hyderabadi biryani, you’ll definitely enjoy this too. Be sure to try it!

audio_description: If you liked the recipe, please like the video and don’t forget to subscribe. And if you try this biryani, leave a comment and let me know how it turned out. Until next time!
